00012 void path::CalculateTotalDistance()
00013 {
00014         int total = 0;
00015         for (int i = 0; i < m_path.size() - 1; i++)
00016         {
00017                 total += sqrt(pow((m_path[i].x - m_path[i + 1].x), 2) + pow((m_path[i].y - m_path[i + 1].y), 2));
00018                 m_totalDistance = total;
00019         }
00020 }
00021 point path::GetPointByDistance(int p)
00022 {
00023         CalculateTotalDistance();
00024         if (p > m_totalDistance)
00025                 p %= m_totalDistance;
00026         int temp_dist = 0;
00027         int total = 0;
00028         for (int i = 0; i < m_path.size() - 1; i++)
00029         {
00030                 total += sqrt(pow((m_path[i].x - m_path[i + 1].x), 2) + pow((m_path[i].y - m_path[i + 1].y), 2));
00031                 if (total > p)
00032                 {
00033                         int req_dist = p - temp_dist;
00034                         float ang_sin = (m_path[i].y - m_path[i + 1].y) / sqrt(pow((m_path[i].x - m_path[i + 1].x), 2) + pow((m_path[i].y - m_path[i + 1].y), 2));
00035                         point po;
00036                         po.y = m_path[i].y - (ang_sin * req_dist);
00037                         float ang_cos = 0;
00038                         if (ang_sin == 0)
00039                                 ang_cos = 1;
00040                         else if (ang_sin == 1)
00041                                 ang_cos = 0;
00042                         else
00043                                 ang_cos = sqrt(1 - pow(((int) ang_sin), 2));
00044                         if (m_path[i].x < m_path[i + 1].x)
00045                                 po.x = m_path[i].x + (ang_cos * req_dist);
00046                         else
00047                                 po.x = m_path[i].x - (ang_cos * req_dist);
00048                         return po;
00049 
00050                 }
00051                 temp_dist = total;
00052         }
00053 
00054 }

00056 void path::AddPoint(int x, int y)
00057 {
00058         point p(x, y);
00059         m_path.push_back(p);
00060 }
00061 point path::GetPointByPercentage(int p)
00062 {
00063         CalculateTotalDistance();
00064         p = (p / 100.00) * m_totalDistance;
00065         return GetPointByDistance(p);
00066
